verses.text_plain: O God, the heathen are come into thine inheritance; thy holy temple have they defiled; they have laid Jerusalem on heaps.
verses.verse_html:
1O God, the heathen are come into thine inheritance; thy holy temple have they defiled; they have laid Jerusalem on heaps. ▼
▼ of: or, for

verses.text_plain: The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven, the flesh of thy saints unto the beasts of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 2The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven, the flesh of thy saints unto the beasts of the earth.

verses.text_plain: Their blood have they shed like water round about Jerusalem; and there was none to bury them.
verses.verse_html: 3Their blood have they shed like water round about Jerusalem; and there was none to bury them.

verses.text_plain: We are become a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and derision to them that are round about us.
verses.verse_html: 4We are become a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and derision to them that are round about us.

tokens.text: to them that are round about

verses.text_plain: How long, Lord? wilt thou be angry for ever? shall thy jealousy burn like fire?
verses.verse_html: 5How long, Lord? wilt thou be angry for ever? shall thy jealousy burn like fire?

verses.text_plain: Pour out thy wrath upon the heathen that have not known thee, and upon the kingdoms that have not called upon thy name.
verses.verse_html: 6Pour out thy wrath upon the heathen that have not known thee, and upon the kingdoms that have not called upon thy name.

verses.text_plain: For they have devoured Jacob, and laid waste his dwelling place.
verses.verse_html: 7For they have devoured Jacob, and laid waste his dwelling place.

verses.text_plain: O remember not against us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us: for we are brought very low.
verses.verse_html:
8O remember not against us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us: for we are brought very low. ▼
▼ former…: or, the iniquities of them that were before us

footnotes.body_text: ▼ former…: or, the iniquities of them that were before us
footnotes.body_html: ▼ former…: or, the iniquities of them that were before us

verses.text_plain: Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name’s sake.
verses.verse_html: 9Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name’s sake.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is their God? let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed.
verses.verse_html:
10Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is their God? let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed. ▼
▼ revenging: Heb. vengeance

verses.text_plain: Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee; according to the greatness of thy power preserve thou those that are appointed to die;
verses.verse_html:
11Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee; according to the greatness of thy power preserve thou those that are appointed to die; ▼
▼ thy…: Heb. thine arm
 , ▼
▼ preserve…: Heb. reserve the children of death

footnotes.body_html: ▼ thy…: Heb. thine arm

footnotes.body_text: ▼ preserve…: Heb. reserve the children of death
footnotes.body_html: ▼ preserve…: Heb. reserve the children of death

verses.text_plain: And render unto our neighbours sevenfold into their bosom their reproach, wherewith they have reproached thee, O Lord.
verses.verse_html: 12And render unto our neighbours sevenfold into their bosom their reproach, wherewith they have reproached thee, O Lord.

verses.text_plain: So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever: we will shew forth thy praise to all generations.
verses.verse_html:
13So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever: we will shew forth thy praise to all generations. ▼
▼ to all…: Heb. to generation and generation

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to all…: Heb. to generation and generation
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to all…: Heb. to generation and generation
